text:
Mixpanel | Software Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Seattle, WA | Onsite | VISA|

We help businesses build better products by delivering tools to enable them to become customer-obsessed and data-informed. Our user analytics product serves over 26,000 customers and 14% of the Fortune 500. We organize in small, nimble product groups (two to five engineers in close partnership with PM and design) with huge autonomy over what we build and how we build it We're hiring full Stack engineers, link below to apply. https://grnh.se/dc6c758d1
